search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for LendingPad (lendingpad.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: Unfortunately, I couldn't find the exact URL to LendingPad's official pricing page. You may need to visit their website at [lendingpad.com](https://lendingpad.com) and navigate to the relevant section or contact their team for accurate information.

[![Image 5: LendingPad Logo](https://lendingpad.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets2023/LendingPad%20Logo.png?width=2445&height=570&name=LendingPad%20Logo.png)](https://lendingpad.com/?hsLang=en)

*   [About Us](https://lendingpad.com/about-us)

 [![Image 6: Get Started](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/e0aeb4ca-d798-4949-a614-2a820452c1a4.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/e0aeb4ca-d798-4949-a614-2a820452c1a4)

The Modern LOS
==============

A unique web-based, end-to-end innovative LOS for residential mortgage lending

 [![Image 7: Request a Demo](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/f6585286-d609-48d4-bbed-1166a6a11db2.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/f6585286-d609-48d4-bbed-1166a6a11db2)

#### LendingPad's Lender Edition

Transform your lending business with LendingPad's powerful Lender Edition.

 [![Image 8: Our Solutions](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/d93d830d-e713-4b7f-91ee-d345d515b54f.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/d93d830d-e713-4b7f-91ee-d345d515b54f)

#### Our Integrated Wholesalers:

 [![Image 9: Check out our marketplace](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/8fb59227-ec2b-487f-a35c-fdb76ebb3b5b.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/8fb59227-ec2b-487f-a35c-fdb76ebb3b5b)

 [![Image 10: Become a Partner](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/5d2822a8-c655-439a-9812-13b062f88427.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/5d2822a8-c655-439a-9812-13b062f88427)

![Image 11: UWM](https://lendingpad.com/hs-fs/hubfs/UWM.jpg?width=57&height=30&name=UWM.jpg)

![Image 12: SIERRA](https://lendingpad.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets2023/SIERRA.png?width=100&height=30&name=SIERRA.png)

![Image 13: ALG-1](https://lendingpad.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets2023/ALG-1.png?width=38&height=30&name=ALG-1.png)

![Image 14: Hemporium  TPO-1](https://lendingpad.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets2023/Hemporium%20%20TPO-1.png?width=199&height=30&name=Hemporium%20%20TPO-1.png)

![Image 15: Worthington MortgageBankers](https://lendingpad.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets2023/Worthington%20MortgageBankers.png?width=137&height=30&name=Worthington%20MortgageBankers.png)

![Image 16: US DIRECT LENDERS](https://lendingpad.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets2023/US%20DIRECT%20LENDERS.png?width=71&height=25&name=US%20DIRECT%20LENDERS.png)

###### Why LendingPad?

Everything is Built-In
----------------------

LendingPad offers a comprehensive solution that includes built-in features and real-time updates, cross-departmental collaboration, insightful management, and analytics, all while helping you stay compliant.

##### Originate with confidence knowing you have a system that helps you make better lending decisions.

![Image 17: Fast To Impliment](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/raw_assets/public/LendingPad/images/module-icons/Fast-to-Implement.svg)

#### Fast-to-Implement

Fast implementation process, allowing users to start originating on the platform quickly and efficiently.

![Image 18: Use Anywhere](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/raw_assets/public/LendingPad/images/module-icons/Use%20Anywhere.svg)

#### Use Anywhere

Enjoy a cloud-based platform that allows users to access its services from anywhere with an Internet connection.

![Image 19: Confidence](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/raw_assets/public/LendingPad/images/module-icons/Scale%20with%20Confidence.svg)

#### Scale with Confidence

Meticulously designed to scale by providing a flexible and customizable platform for mortgage  lending operations.

![Image 20: Efficiently](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/raw_assets/public/LendingPad/images/module-icons/Operate%20Efficiently.svg)

#### Operate Efficiently

Avoid manual workarounds and boost efficiency with automation, integrations, and streamlined workflows. 

 [![Image 21: Check all our Solutions](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/1ef7edf4-0d9b-440a-a254-4f24ecfeffb6.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/1ef7edf4-0d9b-440a-a254-4f24ecfeffb6)

We have solutions for you
-------------------------

LendingPad is a modern loan origination system (LOS) designed for lenders, brokers, banks, and credit unions. Its centralized and compliant automated technology offers solutions for the entire mortgage lending process.

### Broker Edition

A simplified platform allowing you to get back to building your pipeline.

##### Increase efficiency & shorten the lending cycle with:

*   Simplified, intuitive screens.
*   Multi-user processing and real-time notifications.
*   Complementary POS facilitating a seamless borrower experience.
*   Direct wholesale integration and more. 

Complete the origination process with ease and confidence.

 [![Image 22: Learn More](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/faadc1c9-26e3-4306-ac9e-2d16cab541c1.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/faadc1c9-26e3-4306-ac9e-2d16cab541c1)

### Lender Edition

Lend compliantly without sacrificing efficiency.

##### Includes all features in Broker edition plus:

*   Secondary, funding and post closing functions with an unlimited number of users.
*   Capability to perform banking functions and warehousing activities.
*   Administration of third-party channels, and complete secondary tasks with institutional investors.
*   Unparalleled enterprise API.

Platform reliability with unprecedented support, scalability performance and internal admin capabilities.

 [![Image 23: Learn More](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/b9ffa62e-60c3-4d2a-9c07-ee830d9a0250.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/b9ffa62e-60c3-4d2a-9c07-ee830d9a0250)

### Processing Edition

Centralize and simplify your working pipeline.

 [![Image 24: Learn More](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/dfc4edee-6c46-477b-972c-acc4b318b15a.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/dfc4edee-6c46-477b-972c-acc4b318b15a)

*   Single sign-on access to act as an extension of any client's existing back-office team.
*   Task segmentation to efficiently streamline multi-client pipeline management.
*   Multiple role definitions including processor, manager, closer, funder and post closer.
*   Minimize data transfer issues with a centralized source system.

 [![Image 25: Learn More](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/dfc4edee-6c46-477b-972c-acc4b318b15a.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/dfc4edee-6c46-477b-972c-acc4b318b15a)

![Image 26: LendingPad Logo Short-1](https://lendingpad.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets2023/LendingPad%20Logo%20Short-1.png?width=70&height=76&name=LendingPad%20Logo%20Short-1.png)

We have the  
integrations you need
-----------------------------------

LendingPad is proud to bring top industry partners to our platform, enabling you to operate in an open universe.

 [![Image 27: Check out our marketplace](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/acc9d731-9114-4e5d-a709-ceae1fb05e59.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/acc9d731-9114-4e5d-a709-ceae1fb05e59)

 [![Image 28: Become a Partner](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/3178b777-ed18-42a5-9839-5b5e5d8223e4.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/3178b777-ed18-42a5-9839-5b5e5d8223e4)

![Image 29: TopOfMind](https://lendingpad.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Logo/TopOfMind.png?width=104&height=40&name=TopOfMind.png)

![Image 30: MeridianLink](https://lendingpad.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Logo/MeridianLink.png?width=135&height=30&name=MeridianLink.png)

![Image 31: Floift](https://lendingpad.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Floift.png?width=74&height=29&name=Floift.png)

![Image 32: Longify](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/Longify.svg)

![Image 33: FreddieMacc](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/FreddieMacc.svg)

![Image 34: Fannie_mae](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/Fannie_mae.svg)

![Image 35: Bntuch](https://lendingpad.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Bntuch.png?width=105&height=18&name=Bntuch.png)

![Image 36: Shape](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/Shape.svg)

![Image 37: CoreLogic](https://lendingpad.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets2023/CoreLogic.png?width=57&height=45&name=CoreLogic.png)

![Image 38: Fannie_mae](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/Fannie_mae.svg)

![Image 39: Complianceease](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/Complianceease.svg)

![Image 40: DocMagic](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/Imported%20sitepage%20images/DocMagic.svg)

###### Customer Success Stories

Our Clients Believe Us.
-----------------------

#### "Its a great system- the more you use it, the more you understand &like it."

You can go back and forth and change and add & play with it till you're comfortable and all is where you want it to be. Others have this feature which is a great asset. Its abit overwhelming at first by looking at it- but when you start breaking it down piece by piece its easy enough & alot of good info.

![Image 41: Marlen E.](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/raw_assets/public/LendingPad/images/Team/Marlen%20E.png)

Marlen E.

Loan Officer

#### "Lendingpad, all in once"

I like that we can add every detail about our borrowers, and any teammate will be able to see it. From names, AKAs, and properties owned to employment, liabilities, and more! Plus, you can send the requests through Lendinpad, title requests, VOE, Hazard Insurance and more, so it makes my life easier by just clicking on the preview and then send. Additionally, you can balance your closing disclosure on the platform, and it even helps you calculate some of the fees.

![Image 42: Fernanda M.](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/raw_assets/public/LendingPad/images/Team/Fernanda%20M..png)

Fernanda M.

Operations Assistant

#### "Its a great system- the more you use it, the more you understand &like it."

You can go back and forth and change and add & play with it till you're comfortable and all is where you want it to be. Others have this feature which is a great asset. Its abit overwhelming at first by looking at it- but when you start breaking it down piece by piece its easy enough & alot of good info.

![Image 43: Marlen E.](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/raw_assets/public/LendingPad/images/Team/Marlen%20E.png)

Marlen E.

Loan Officer

#### "Lendingpad, all in once"

I like that we can add every detail about our borrowers, and any teammate will be able to see it. From names, AKAs, and properties owned to employment, liabilities, and more! Plus, you can send the requests through Lendinpad, title requests, VOE, Hazard Insurance and more, so it makes my life easier by just clicking on the preview and then send. Additionally, you can balance your closing disclosure on the platform, and it even helps you calculate some of the fees.

![Image 44: Fernanda M.](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/raw_assets/public/LendingPad/images/Team/Fernanda%20M..png)

Fernanda M.

Operations Assistant

 [![Image 45: Read all Reviews on Capterra](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/cf29ee1e-82ea-4803-832e-26c504d0d854.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/cf29ee1e-82ea-4803-832e-26c504d0d854)

 [![Image 46: Read all Reviews on G2](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/d8eda652-0bd6-4a0e-a725-272efd6ca7f2.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/d8eda652-0bd6-4a0e-a725-272efd6ca7f2)

 [![Image 47: Reviews Widget 1](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/912062c9-1f66-4b20-9ac1-4454bcbfd25d.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/912062c9-1f66-4b20-9ac1-4454bcbfd25d)

 [![Image 48: Reviews G2](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/611612ba-285b-4704-9917-facc77a18832.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/611612ba-285b-4704-9917-facc77a18832)

###### How it Works

Working with LendingPad is simple.
----------------------------------

![Image 49](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/raw_assets/public/LendingPad/images/module-icons/Signup.svg)

#### 1\. Sign Up Now

Register your company and receive log-in credentials instantly. The system is pre-configured by industry best practices and is set up for immediate plug-and-play.

![Image 50](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/raw_assets/public/LendingPad/images/module-icons/Review%20Training.svg)

#### 2\. Receive Training

Attend monthly webinars for training and system updates. Sign up for LendingPad's certification courses and utilize our extensive training library.

![Image 51](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/raw_assets/public/LendingPad/images/module-icons/Start%20Lending%20Better.svg)

#### 3\. Start Lending Better

Focus on building your pipeline and increasing the volume of closed loans. Make informed decisions faster than ever before, allowing your business to scale with unparalleled speed and accuracy.

 [![Image 52: Sign Up Now](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/b12ef5ba-0126-4e66-a9fd-3671e4deb734.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/b12ef5ba-0126-4e66-a9fd-3671e4deb734)

 [![Image 53: Request a Demo](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/7b5971dc-9d8e-441d-af54-b8e09f8b37c7.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/7b5971dc-9d8e-441d-af54-b8e09f8b37c7)

![Image 54: ebook 1](https://lendingpad.com/hubfs/ebook%201.svg)

### 10 Questions  
to Ask Your LOS Vendor

###### 10 Point Checklist in Choosing the Best Loan Origination System for Your Business

Download the full list to assist your evaluation process and better understand what steps your vendor is taking to stay technologically relevant in a rapidly changing tech landscape.

 [![Image 55: Download Now](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/6314491/2fb4512b-2ee7-47f8-b8a2-924cbaf7842d.png)](https://cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/6314491/2fb4512b-2ee7-47f8-b8a2-924cbaf7842d)

[![Image 56: LendingPad White-1](https://lendingpad.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Assets2023/LendingPad%20White-1.png?width=207&height=48&name=LendingPad%20White-1.png)](https://www.lendingpad.com/?hsLang=en)
